item.title: Getting a job in Tech - Part 1
item.description: In this edition of #tech on ice, we start with part 1 of a "Getting a job in tech" series that I will be doing. This part is all about picking the tech that is most interesting to you and using it as a good starting point. Follow along! #technology #programming #developer #coldplunge

item.title: I've had a change of heart regarding employee metrics
item.description: I know that if you go back far enough in these posts of mine, you will find some real crap in there. Sometimes that's because I had a position on something that turned out to not be very useful, or in some cases, actively harmful. This sucks, but that's life: you encounter new information and you are given the opportunity to change your mind, and then sometimes you actually do exactly that.

item.title: Controles Gratuitos de DevExpress para .NET MAUI
item.description:
En este video, exploramos los controles gratuitos que DevExpress ofrece para .NET MAUI. Descubre cómo estos componentes pueden mejorar tus aplicaciones multiplataforma.
01:24 Controles DevExpress para .NET MAUI 03:25 Demo 12:34 Obtener licencia gratuita 13:36 La documentación 13:56 Registro de NuGet 15:24 Configuración de la librería 16:24 Usando controles

item.title: Be careful with ToListAsync and ToArrayAsync in Entity Framework Core
item.description: Entity Framework has two methods for converting a query to a list or an array: ToListAsync and ToArrayAsync. Of course there is also the sync version of these methods: ToList and ToArray. And sometimes, you should use the latter one!

item.title: Mastering EF Core: Scaffold DB Context from Existing Database in .NET
item.description:
Unlock the power of Database First approach in Entity Framework Core with this comprehensive step-by-step tutorial! Learn how to create an EF Core model by scaffolding a DB context from an existing database. Perfect for C# developers working with Entity Framework Core and looking to enhance their database integration skills. In this video, you'll discover:
• How to set up your environment for Database First approach • Implementing scaffold commands to generate your DB context • Customizing and optimizing the generated models • Best practices for working with existing databases in EF Core
Whether you're new to EF Core or an experienced developer, this guide will help you seamlessly integrate existing databases into your .NET applications. Boost your skills in database programming, ASP.NET Core, and C# development.
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/remigiusz-zalewski
#dotnet #aspnetcore #efcore #csharp
item.author: (Remigiusz Zalewski)
